body.name: Bluetooth Speaker, Loud Portable Wireless Speakers, IPX6 Waterproof, 15Watts, with FM Radio, 5 LED Lights Modes, MIC, TWS Pairing, BT5.3, for Party Camping Shower Home Gadgets Outdoor Birthday Him Her

features: SHOCKING SOUND EXPERIENCE: The LACEVIEW Portable Bluetooth Speaker uses a high-quality digital signal processor, drivers and advanced technology to deliver 15 watts of powerful, balanced, high-fidelity loud sound that ensures clear, powerful and distortion-free sound at any volume, allowing you to experience unrivalled sound quality like never before.

DUAL BLUETOOTH SPEAKER PAIRING CONNECTION: Get two LACEVIEW Bluetooth speakers, connect them together, and enjoy 30W(2x15W) of truly immersive stereo surround sound that fills your parties and home with powerful surround sound. It's a truly unparalleled listening experience that's effortless to experience in the living room, at parties and more!

PORTABLE SPEAKER WITH FM RADIO FUNCTION: Plug the included audio cable into this compact small portable Bluetooth speaker as an antenna for the radio to enhance the search for channel signals, click the function button to switch to FM radio mode, and then simply press the power button to automatically search for FM channels.

COLOURFUL LED LIGHT SHOW: This Bluetooth speaker offers different colour-changing themes, unique RGB night themed lights and a visually stunning colourful dynamic light show, that can be synced to the beat of the music, which can be easily selected according to your preference by simply pressing the light button to enhance the ambience and make any party more memorable. You can also switch the lights off or just on.

WATERPROOF AND RUGGED: The IPX6 rated compact Bluetooth speaker can easily withstand heavy waves, rain, snow, dust and liquid splashes. Perfect for showers, poolside, beach, hiking, biking, camping, parties and other indoor and outdoor places. No need to worry about the weather and outdoor environment, it is definitely your best music companion!

BLUETOOTH 5.3 AND CALL FUNCTION: The wireless Bluetooth speaker uses Bluetooth version 5.3 chip and advanced processor to provide fast connection and stable playback, and the 33FT wireless transmission range provides a stable and smooth signal for your music and calls.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: LACEVIEW LED Lights Portable Wireless Bluetooth Speaker LACEVIEW Top quality wireless Bluetooth speaker designed by smooth lines and unique look, small and lightweight, compact and rugged. It is easy to carry this portable speaker in your backpack and experience clear, surging sound anywhere, whether you're camping or hiking.

Small body, big power Loud and Powerful Sound The Portable Bluetooth Speaker adopts a high-quality digital signal processor, drivers and advanced technology to deliver 15 watts of powerful, balanced, high-fidelity loud full-range stereo sound that ensures powerful and clear, allowing you to experience unrivalled sound quality like never before.

Previous page Dazzling LED lights. 5 LED Light Modes Cool colorful RGB lights on the powerful Bluetooth speaker can easily light up parties and festivals Rechargeable speaker Long Battery Life This small wireless Bluetooth speaker can play continuously for at least 12 hours at medium volume. Waterproof Bluetooth Speaker Used on the beach, bathroom and poolside, even if you accidentally fall into the water without worry Easy to Control Portable Bluetooth Speaker Adjusting the volume, skipping songs, switching modes such as light or FM is easy with the buttons. Convenient input ports Rational Requirements Design Bluetooth speakers support inserting SD card, U-disk, audio cable to play, and type-C charge port Next page 1 Beating Music 2 Long Battery Life 3 IPX6 Waterproof 4 User-Friendly Buttons 5 Multi Functional Ports

FM Radio Switch the Bluetooth speaker to FM radio function, listen to different FM channels, such as news, songs, radio programs, etc., to help you instantly get a variety of real-time policy and life information, is a good companion for your life. Built in Microphone When an incoming call comes in, quickly press the switch on the Bluetooth speaker to answer the call. This frees up your hands for anything else!

Memory Function The next time you turn the device, the Bluetooth speaker will automatically connect to your phone and the volume level and light mode will be the same as the last time you set it up. Portable Speaker The lanyard design of the portable Bluetooth speaker, has a small and appropriate size so it is easy to put it in your bag or hang it anywhere.

Dual Pairing Pair a pair of SP01 Bluetooth speakers for double-volume surround sound. Great for parties and creating immersive amazing soundscapes. As Portable Car Speaker The portable Bluetooth speaker can be used as a car speaker, just connect your cell phone's Bluetooth, the sound can fill the whole car, enjoy any music to bring a relaxing and enjoyable journey! Ideal Bluetooth Speaker for Indoor Stereo volume Bluetooth speakers for home and indoor speaker systems, making sound suitable for TVs, offices, schools and classrooms. Terrific Wireless Computer Speaker Cool stereo wireless Bluetooth speakers, cordless use, computer desktop clean and tidy, so that the game is not detained and enjoyable! Adding Eye-Catching Atmosphere to Short Videos Bluetooth speakers can give off dazzle colorful lights, adding luster to your dance steps to make your short video more attractive to the audience's eyes, Christmas and holidays more ambient sense. Perfect Gift for Him/Her Top quality and high quality LACEVIEW Dazzling Colorful Lighted Bluetooth Speaker, excellent in both inside and outside, makes a great gift for him, her and your friends and family.

How to pairing dual(TWS) LACEVIEW Bluetooth speakers? 1. Turn on the 2 portable speakers 2. Press the "M" button of either speaker twice, you will hear a short cue sound 3. Open your device's Bluetooth and searched one model which named: LACEVIEW-SP01, connect it is ok. What is the FM radio channel mode of Bluetooth speaker? Plug in an audio cable as an antenna for Bluetooth speaker and automatically search for existing local FM radio channels, whether it's news or entertainment, without having to tune in. What is the IPX6 waterproof rating mean of LACEVIEW Bluetooth speaker? IPX6 rated water-resistant waterproof Bluetooth speaker, even if any direction directly subjected to water jets will not enter the interior. How to charge the wireless Bluetooth speakers? Initial charging of the rechargeable speaker requires a full 4 hours, as subsequent charging will be sufficient for less than 4 hours. The indicator light is red when charging and blue when fully charged. How to control the colorful mood lighting of Bluetooth speaker? Each time press and hold the M button, the light will change until the light turns off. Operate again to turn the light on.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great sounding speaker for the shower
reviews.reviewText: The Bluetooth Speaker offers an impressive set of features suitable for various occasions. With its larger than average 15-watt output, it delivers loud and clear audio, making it ideal for use in my shower which is why I originally bought this. I loved the IPX6 waterproof rating which ensures durability and reliability. Its FM radio function adds versatility to entertainment options, while the built-in microphone enables hands-free calling (unlikely to use this while rocking out in the shower LOL). Additionally, the speaker's TWS pairing capability allows users to connect two speakers for a stereo sound experience, enhancing the overall audio quality - this alone will have me buying another one for that stereo sound! With its sleek design and five LED light modes, this speaker serves as a stylish addition to any setting, making it a versatile and practical gadget suitable for all occasions.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Reliable waterproof speaker
reviews.reviewText: This product is actually pretty great! It works very well in the shower, which was the main reason I bought it. The water proof feature is great, while keeping a reliable sound quality. It is very portable and LED colors are bright with various color options. Long lasting and charges quickly. Def recommend for someone who wants a waterproof speaker.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good product for the price
reviews.reviewText: I bought this bluetooth speaker for my daughter as a Christmas gift and she loved it. Its a compact size so easy to carry in her backpack and the battery last for a good amount of time. For the price this was a great buy! I can say that its not as loud as she would like it, but I thought the sound quality was fine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It has a great sound.
reviews.reviewText: I like that the sound was perfect and an easy hook up to my phone. I bought for my desk at work since we can't use Wi-Fi and it works great. It also is a great size and I love the colors. The battery also last for a quite a long time and I like I can use it anywhere. My husband and I test ran it on New years eve and love it. I am planning on buying another one as a gift to my friend as a birthday gift for her desk at work as well. I don't have any dislikes for the speaker.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Potable Bluetooth Speaker
reviews.reviewText: Lance view Bluetooth Portable Speaker is the best I have purchased yet. I have went through my fare share to finally get one that not only appeased me but it was exactly what I expected to get from description and pics I saw. My pros and cons are listed below.PROS:+when no wifi I can revert to FM radio+satisfying sound+light weight & perfect size to carry in bike basket+multiple LED light settings+charges rapidly+slot for storage cardCONS:-using cable for antenna works but reception is glitch-when switching to FM mode the volume comes on startling loud instead of staying at setting when previously usingOverall I would definitely refer this speaker to other as well as buy it again as gifts or personal use. I am simply thrilled to finally get what I was wanting in a portable Bluetooth speaker. Especially when it's my comfort when riding my bicycle for transportation. And some trips can be a bit lengthy. Thank you!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought these speakers as Christmas gifts, gave one to my son he really enjoys how practical and easy to carry around as you can hook it to your back pack, take it hiking or play music on your fork lift as he does.Sounds great! nice and sturdy well made and not cheap looking either, definitely a great purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This Bluetooth speaker is a total game-changer! It pumps out a whopping 15 watts of sound, making it crazy loud and perfect for parties or just jamming out at home. The fact that it's IPX6 waterproof is a total lifesaver – no more stressing about accidental spills or rain ruining the vibe. And get this, it even has an FM radio built in, so you've got more options for entertainment. But the coolest part? The five LED lights that go with the music, turning any space into a full-on party zone. Honestly, it's a must-have for anyone who loves good tunes and good times.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very nice portable Bluetooth/aux speaker. Easily gets loud enough to use as PC speakers or play music on. Bass is pretty good too. Definitely not junk quality which is awesome for the price. Battery is not the best though but is kind of expected for the size and price.
